comment: She takes attendance everyday. We had three papers for the whole semester and a few quizzes. The quizzes are about the content in class and aren't lockdown browser. I recommend coming to majority of the semester because we usually have a class activity everyday for a participation grade. Other than that, shes chill and offers extra credit.

I really enjoyed Professor Elrod's class. She grades well and isn't super picky. It is easy to cushion your grade with a lot of 100%s if you come to class and do the in class assignments. A little bit harsher grader on major assignments, but not bad. Kind and funny, but does not take likely to students talking during class, she would call them out.
